name: Artie's Aimless Adventure
description:
Maneuver Artie the Square around an endless sky! Generate an ice track around him to manipulate his trajectory!

Works best with an Xbox controller (though you can make it work with a keyboard).

Controls:

Start (or O) - Begin freefall / Start Game

Left Joystick + A (or WASD + K) - generate ice relative to Artie . (for example, holding up and A will generate ice above Artie. Downleft will generate ice downleft of Artie)

RT (or M) - Accelerate

--

Music By taron

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cgp5s93ZZKw

--

Trying to dive into game dev by writing a #GameAWeek.

Week 4 (ish): Initial idea was to imitate Frozone's ability to generate an ice track and slide/skate along the track. Turned into a realtime line-rider-esque exploration game.
